document.full_text: portugal has agreed a three-year, 78-billion-euro ($116 billion) bailout with the european union and imf, caretaker prime minister jose socrates said on tuesday.
document.title: portugal agrees on a 78-billion euro eu/imf bailout
lines_and_colors: portugal has agreed a three-year, 78-billion-euro ($116 billion) bailout with the european union and imf, caretaker prime minister jose socrates said on tuesday.
